Name: Converter
Description: Basic worker unit. Can gather resources and shape Keiron structures.**Can attack ground units**

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders Probe to gather resources from a selected Mineral Field or Vespene Geyser.
Root.Name: Gather

Root.Tooltip: Returns the carried resources to the nearest drop-off point.
Root.Name: Return Cargo

Root.Tooltip: Halts construction of this structure. The partial construction will remain.
Root.Name: Halt

Root.Tooltip: Releases the Fuse inhabiting this unit, losing the associated bonus.
Root.Name: Unfuse

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel

0002.Tooltip: Primary structure. Used to create all Keiron units and receive gathered resources. Can be upgraded to use Energize.
0002.Name: Shape Citadel

0002.Tooltip:
Tech facility.

Enables:
- Pulsars from the Citadel
- Subjecters from the Citadel
0002.Name: Shape Sanctum

0002.Tooltip:
Basic tech facility.

Enables:
- Pariah from the Citadel
- Volts from the Citadel
- Oculi from the Converter
0002.Name: Shape Edifice

0002.Tooltip: Anti-ground defensive structure. **Can attack ground units**
0002.Name: Shape Nullifier

0002.Tooltip:
Able to grant vision of areas on the map at a long range.

Detector
0002.Name: Shape Oculus

0002.Tooltip: Shaped over a Vespene Geyser to allow harvesting of vespene gas.
0002.Name: Shape Formulator

0002.Tooltip:
Anti-air defensive structure. **Can attack air units**
Detector
0002.Name: Shape Stratus

0002.Tooltip:
Upgrade tech facility.

Enables:
- Nullifiers from the Converter
- Strati from the Converter
0002.Name: Shape Reliquary

0002.Tooltip:
Basic air tech facility.

Enables:
- Echoes from the Citadel
- Fuses from the Citadel
0002.Name: Shape Conduit

0003.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0003.Name: Cancel

0003.Tooltip:
Advanced tech facility.

Enables:
- Meridians from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Elysium

0003.Tooltip:
Advanced tech facility.

Enables:
- Umbrae from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Foundry

0003.Tooltip:
Advanced tech facility.

Enables:
- Inducers from the Citadel
- Myriads from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Atrium

0003.Tooltip:
Advanced air tech facility.

Enables:
- Apertures from the Citadel
- Auroras from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Outlet

0003.Tooltip:
Highly advanced tech facility.

Enables:
- Titans from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Pantheon

0003.Tooltip:
Advanced air tech facility.

Enables:
- Harbingers from the Citadel
- Gyres from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Empyrean

0003.Tooltip:
Highly advanced tech facility.

Enables:
- Paragons from the Citadel
0003.Name: Shape Zenith
